trans-unit.source: Provides properties that define the visual appearance of the axis labels.
Members of this class are also used to calculate the intervals and positions of the axis labels, and to draw them.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelStyle"></xref> class.
Gets or sets a value that represents the angle at which the font is drawn.
An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer " name="integer " href=""></xref>value.
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelStyle"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether the label is enabled.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the label is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the font of the label.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> object.
Gets or sets the color of the label.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.
Gets or sets the formatting string for the label text.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value.
Gets or sets the size of the label interval.
This property is not set by default.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value.
Gets or sets the offset of the label interval.
This property is not set by default.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value.
Gets or sets the unit of measurement of the label interval offset.
This property is not set by default.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref> enumeration value.
Gets or sets the unit of measurement for the size of a label interval.
This property is not set by default.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref> enumeration value.
Gets or sets a flag that determines whether the labels are shown at axis ends.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the labels are shown at axis ends; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a flag that determines whether the labels are shown with an offset.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the labels are shown with an offset; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a flag that determines whether the labels can be truncated.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the labels can be truncated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref>.
